Identification.LongTitle: Oaths of Allegiance and Office Order (Yukon)

Section.Text: The oath of allegiance prescribed by the Oaths of Allegiance Act is the oath of allegiance to be taken and subscribed by the Commissioner of Yukon.
The oath of office to be taken and subscribed by the Commissioner of Yukon is set out in Schedule I.

The oath of allegiance and oath of office of the Commissioner of Yukon shall be sworn and subscribed before a judge of the Supreme Court of the Yukon Territory or, in his absence, a police magistrate.

ScheduleFormHeading.Label: SCHEDULE I
ScheduleFormHeading.TitleText: Oath of Office for Commissioner of Yukon

Schedule.Oath: I, , do solemnly and sincerely promise and swear that I will duly and faithfully and to the best of my skill and knowledge execute the powers and trust reposed in me as the Commissioner of Yukon. So help me God.
